Package controller

Class CustomerFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerFormController
public class CustomerFormController extends Object
This controller class provides logic for the Customer Form.

    • customerFormSaveButtonClicked

      public void customerFormSaveButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method handles the save button on the customer form screen. The method checks if there are any empty fields and will display an error message. If all fields are completed, then the method will save the customer as a new customer if the customerID field is empty. If the customerID field isn't empty, the method will update the existing customer in the database. After the method saves the data to the database, it will take the user back to the main table views screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - --> save button clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception
      SQLException
      IOException

    • customerFormBackButtonClicked

      public void customerFormBackButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the back button, and it'll check if the user wants to cancel adding or updating a customer. If the user answers no, then it'll let the user stay on the page. If the user answers yes, then the appointment screen will not send any data to the database and returns the user to the main table views screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - --> cancel button clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception
      IOException

    • retrieveCountryData

      public void retrieveCountryData(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method retrieves data to create a list of countries to fill the country combo box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - selects a country from the list.
      Throws:
      SQLException
